text: Thierstein is one of the 10 districts of the canton of Solothurn in Switzerland, found in the north of the canton. Thierstein contains 12 municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area, km² Bärschwil 877 11.20 Beinwil 310 22.67 Breitenbach 3330 6.83 Büsserach 1920 7.55 Erschwil 922 7.48 Fehren 586 1.50 Grindel 492 3.05 Himmelried 968 6.00 Kleinlützel 1297 16.34 Meltingen 617 5.76 Nunningen 1919 10.27 Zullwil 597 3.63 Total 13,835 102.28
title: Thierstein District
